summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SD-XS local image generation app. All core features working correctly including model loading from HuggingFace, image generation, and UI integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 status code instead of 400 when no model is loaded
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling inconsistency - should return 400 for client errors

passed_tests: Model URL input accepts HuggingFace URLs
Model download and loading from HuggingFace (IDKiro/sdxs-512-0.9)
Status messages display during download and loading
Generate button properly disabled until model loaded
Prompt input field accepts text prompts
Image generation from text prompts works
Generated images displayed in UI correctly
Images saved to backend data/images/ directory
Full end-to-end workflow from model loading to image generation

success_percentage.backend: 85% (6/7 tests passed - minor error code issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix error handling in /api/generate endpoint to return 400 status code instead of 500 when no model is loaded (minor issue)
